title.narrative: Accountability and Fulfilment for Older Persons in Order to Raise their Dignity - AFFORD

description.narrative: Older People's rights, their access to social protection and quality health care is reflected in public policy at national and international level
Older men and women access age-friendly health/HIV programmes
Older men and women benefit from more accessible social protection programmes
Purpose of project is for older men and women, and their families, benefitting from age-friendly and more accessible social protection and health/HIV programmes

participating-org.narrative: Irish Aid - Department of Foreign Affairs and Trad
Muthade Society for the Aged (MUSA), South Africa

mailing-address.narrative: Tavis House, 1-6 Tavistock Square, London WC1H 9NA

recipient-country.narrative: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland (The)
